text: Baru he nabi! Tiniharu sababhanda badhi jivanaprati moha rakhneharu hun. Ra yo moha tiniharuma allahasamga aruko sajhedari thahara'uneharubhanda pani badhi huncha. Tiniharumadhye harekale ekaâ€“eka hajara varsasam'ma bamcne iccha rakhdacha. Tara yo lamo umerale pani tinala'i sajayabata mukta gara'una sakdaina, ra juna kama yiniharu gardachan tyasala'i allahale ramrosita dekhiraheko cha
